body_html: It looks correct to me. Softmax2d does a softmax over channels, in each point of the 3rd and 4th dimension independently. You have only a single channel, so all values get normalized to ones.
body_text: It looks correct to me. Softmax2d does a softmax over channels, in each point of the 3rd and 4th dimension independently. You have only a single channel, so all values get normalized to ones.
body: It looks correct to me. `Softmax2d` does a softmax over channels, in each point of the 3rd and 4th dimension independently. You have only a single channel, so all values get normalized to ones.
